website_summaries.verdict: The General Electric X450 digital camera features a long zoom lens for a budget price, but speed and image quality at higher ISOs are issues.
cons: Image quality suffers greatly at moderate ISO

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a first time camera buyer!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is used every single day. I love it because it is simple to use and you can just point and shoot. I use it for blogging. I do wish that it came with a rechargeable battery pack instead of 4 batteries, however it still gets the job done. The quality of pictures is just awesome! A must have for a first time camera buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is much greater than I expected. More features than my old cannon.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Love all the features and options
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my digital camera broke and will never be going back. Love all the features and options. Was afraid that the transition would be difficult as this is a bit bulkier but I fell in love with it. Great for taking pictures of my very active two year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to either see a longer lasting battery pack for ...
customer_reviews.text: It has some issues and low battery life when using the flash. I'd like to either see a longer lasting battery pack for this or remove the flash and have an attachment mount for it. I also don't like that there is no view port. I like to hold the camera up to my eye and actually see my target like the old days.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and good service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he is so excited. It is an excellent beginners digital camera and has a lot of features so he will be able to learn a lot as he uses this camera.
customer_reviews.author: John43

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera for my 6 years old son to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun camera for my 6 years old son to use for taking pictures. You definitely need additional memory card though because the built in one allows you to take a few pictures before it becomes full.
customer_reviews.author: Quynn

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, I had an old Kodak digital camera that after about 11 years it just started eating camera batteries. I really like the functionality of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneCook

customer_reviews.title: quickly objects issues/ zoom issues.....
customer_reviews.text: mmm. it's ok for the price, but it's a little hard to take pictures to any pet which are moving constantly. it's a little hard to focus when you are using zoom. well, it's ok for the price....
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Not a professional camera, but great for amateurs.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Berry

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my lost GE Digital with this Twin. Familiar to use and great photos!
customer_reviews.text: Lost my GE made camera in an apartment fire; tried ordering an Olympus with no luck. So I decided on the familiar camera and settings; great photos with pretty intuitive dial your format feature. I do get lost with info and menu features; but that's because I'm not an instruction type of gal.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Still Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the camera and the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith DeJohn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: In love with camera. Exceeded my expectations. Would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Jayleen

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price a very good camera. I bought 2 one for myself and one for a friend
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Izzo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. Would recommend to other people. has a great zoom and focus on it, takes great quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This camera does take batteries Nice camera though
customer_reviews.text: I just wasn't aware that it wasn't rechargeable , This camera does take batteries Nice camera though
customer_reviews.author: lacie barens

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off of qvc, and it was perfect! being a beginner, I needed somrthing simple, and this was it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pospisil

customer_reviews.title: it might be a good starter for someone else
customer_reviews.text: I have a cannon EOS Rebel T2i and wanted a less intimidating one to practice with but I was not sold on this camera...it might be a good starter for someone else...
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

product_meta.title: General Imaging X450-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description: The new X450 is packed full of features including a long zoom lens, featuring 25x Optical Zoom and 4x Digital Zoom, now taking quality photos is a cinch. A 24mm wide-angle lens captures more in every frame and the convenient Eye-Fi compatibility (Eye-Fi card sold separately) feature allows you to connect and upload your favorite shots right as they're captured. The X450 also includes object tracking to help automatically focus and track fast moving objects, optical image stabilization which automatically adjusts for unintentional camera movements and face beautifier to automatically enhance a subject's face by softening unnatural skin tones and brightening and opening eyes. What could be easier? In the Box: X450 Digital Camera, 4xAA Batteries, USB Cable, Shoulder Strap, CD-ROM, Lens Cover, User Manual, Quick Start Guide , Warranty Card
feature_bullets: 16 MP Digital Camera with 25X Optical Zoom
Built-in 8MB Internal Memory with up to 32GB support of SD/SDHC Card (MMC Card not supported)
Electronic view finder, Optical Image Stabilization, Face Beautifier, Pan capture,

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
